verses.verse: Behold <WH2005>, the YY'S <WH3068> hand <WH3027> is not shortened <WH7114> <WH8804>, that it cannot save <WH3467> <WH8687>; neither his ear <WH241> heavy <WH3513> <WH8804>, that it cannot hear <WH8085> <WH8800>:

But your iniquities <WH5771> have separated <WH914> <WH8688> between <WH996> you and your 'Elohim <WH430>, and your sins <WH2403> have hid <WH5641> <WH8689> his face <WH6440> from you, that he will not hear <WH8085> <WH8800>.

For your hands <WH3709> are defiled <WH1351> <WH8738> with blood <WH1818>, and your fingers <WH676> with iniquity <WH5771>; your lips <WH8193> have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> lies <WH8267>, your tongue <WH3956> hath muttered <WH1897> <WH8799> perverseness <WH5766>.

None calleth <WH7121> <WH8802> for justice <WH6664>, nor any pleadeth <WH8199> <WH8737> for truth <WH530>: they trust <WH982> <WH8800> in vanity <WH8414>, and speak <WH1696> <WH8763> lies <WH7723>; they conceive <WH2029> <WH8800> mischief <WH5999>, and bring forth <WH3205> <WH8687> iniquity <WH205>.

They hatch <WH1234> <WH8765> cockatrice <WH6848> ' eggs <WH1000>, and weave <WH707> <WH8799> the spider's <WH5908> web <WH6980>: he that eateth <WH398> <WH8802> of their eggs <WH1000> dieth <WH4191> <WH8799>, and that which is crushed <WH2116> breaketh out <WH1234> <WH8735> into a viper <WH660>.

Their webs <WH6980> shall not become garments <WH899>, neither shall they cover <WH3680> <WH8691> themselves with their works <WH4639>: their works <WH4639> are works <WH4639> of iniquity <WH205>, and the act <WH6467> of violence <WH2555> is in their hands <WH3709>.

Their feet <WH7272> run <WH7323> <WH8799> to evil <WH7451>, and they make haste <WH4116> <WH8762> to shed <WH8210> <WH8800> innocent <WH5355> blood <WH1818>: their thoughts <WH4284> are thoughts <WH4284> of iniquity <WH205>; wasting <WH7701> and destruction <WH7667> are in their paths <WH4546>.

The way <WH1870> of peace <WH7965> they know <WH3045> <WH8804> not; and there is no judgment <WH4941> in their goings <WH4570>: they have made them crooked <WH6140> <WH8765> paths <WH5410>: whosoever goeth <WH1869> <WH8802> therein shall not know <WH3045> <WH8804> peace <WH7965>.

Therefore is judgment <WH4941> far <WH7368> <WH8804> from us, neither doth justice <WH6666> overtake <WH5381> <WH8686> us: we wait <WH6960> <WH8762> for light <WH216>, but behold obscurity <WH2822>; for brightness <WH5054>, but we walk <WH1980> <WH8762> in darkness <WH653>.

We grope <WH1659> <WH8762> for the wall <WH7023> like the blind <WH5787>, and we grope <WH1659> <WH8762> as if we had no eyes <WH5869>: we stumble <WH3782> <WH8804> at noonday <WH6672> as in the night <WH5399>; we are in desolate <WH820> places as dead <WH4191> <WH8801> men.

We roar <WH1993> <WH8799> all like bears <WH1677>, and mourn <WH1897> <WH8799> sore <WH1897> <WH8800> like doves <WH3123>: we look <WH6960> <WH8762> for judgment <WH4941>, but there is none; for salvation <WH3444>, but it is far off <WH7368> <WH8804> from us.

For our transgressions <WH6588> are multiplied <WH7231> <WH8804> before thee, and our sins <WH2403> testify <WH6030> <WH8804> against us: for our transgressions <WH6588> are with us; and as for our iniquities <WH5771>, we know <WH3045> <WH8804> them;

In transgressing <WH6586> <WH8800> and lying <WH3584> <WH8763> against the YY <WH3068>, and departing away <WH5253> <WH8800> from <WH310> our 'Elohim <WH430>, speaking <WH1696> <WH8763> oppression <WH6233> and revolt <WH5627>, conceiving <WH2029> <WH8780> and uttering <WH1897> <WH8774> from the heart <WH3820> words <WH1697> of falsehood <WH8267>.

And judgment <WH4941> is turned away <WH5253> <WH8717> backward <WH268>, and justice <WH6666> standeth <WH5975> <WH8799> afar off <WH7350>: for truth <WH571> is fallen <WH3782> <WH8804> in the street <WH7339>, and equity <WH5229> cannot <WH3201> <WH8799> enter <WH935> <WH8800>.

Yea, truth <WH571> faileth <WH5737> <WH8737>; and he that departeth <WH5493> <WH8804> from evil <WH7451> maketh himself a prey <WH7997> <WH8711>: and the YY <WH3068> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> it, and it displeased <WH3415> <WH8799> <WH5869> him that there was no judgment <WH4941>.

And he saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that there was no man <WH376>, and wondered <WH8074> <WH8709> that there was no intercessor <WH6293> <WH8688>: therefore his arm <WH2220> brought salvation <WH3467> <WH8686> unto him; and his righteousness <WH6666>, it sustained <WH5564> <WH8804> him.

For he put on <WH3847> <WH8799> righteousness <WH6666> as a breastplate <WH8302>, and an helmet <WH3553> of salvation <WH3444> upon his head <WH7218>; and he put on <WH3847> <WH8799> the garments <WH899> of vengeance <WH5359> for clothing <WH8516>, and was clad <WH5844> <WH8799> with zeal <WH7068> as a cloke <WH4598>.

According to <WH5921> their deeds <WH1578>, accordingly he will repay <WH7999> <WH8762>, fury <WH2534> to his adversaries <WH6862>, recompence <WH1576> to his enemies <WH341> <WH8802>; to the islands <WH339> he will repay <WH7999> <WH8762> recompence <WH1576>.

So shall they fear <WH3372> <WH8799> the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068> from the west <WH4628>, and his glory <WH3519> from the rising <WH4217> of the sun <WH8121>. When the enemy <WH6862> shall come in <WH935> <WH8799> like a flood <WH5104>, the Spirit <WH7307> of the YY <WH3068> shall lift up a standard <WH5127> <WH8790> against him.

And the Redeemer <WH1350> <WH8802> shall come <WH935> <WH8804> to TZiyon <WH6726>, and unto them that turn <WH7725> <WH8802> from transgression <WH6588> in Ya`akov <WH3290>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>.

As for me, this is my covenant <WH1285> with them, saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>; My spirit <WH7307> that is upon thee, and my words <WH1697> which I have put <WH7760> <WH8804> in thy mouth <WH6310>, shall not depart <WH4185> <WH8799> out of thy mouth <WH6310>, nor out of the mouth <WH6310> of thy seed <WH2233>, nor out of the mouth <WH6310> of thy seed's <WH2233> seed <WH2233>, saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>, from henceforth and for <WH5704> ever <WH5769>.
